comments:
Description:
[Smoke]Preview failed when a crosstab include datetype dimension[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070620-1031

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a cube include datetime t ype dimension
2, Using it in crosstab
3, Preview

Expected result:
Preview successfully

Actual result:
Exception occurs and no date value retrived

Error log:
Retrieving binding data error ( 42 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Retrieving binding data error at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.DataItemExecutor.execute(DataItemExecutor.java:116) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.wrap.WrappedReportItemExecutor.execute(WrappedReportItemExecutor.java:45) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.dup.SuppressDuplicateItemExecutor.execute(SuppressDuplicateItemExecutor.java:42) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.wrap.WrappedReportItemExecutor.execute(WrappedReportItemExecutor.java:45)
The 'year'&'month' etc levels in datatime dimension should be taken on as Integer value. It should not be date-time. This is cube designer's bug.

Verified on v20070620-1610 build
Closed & Regards~
